name: Paradigm (itch)
description:
This game is a mystery visual novel with puzzles, humor and pixel art. It features multiple endings; see if you can find them all.

The controls are w-a-s-d or arrow keys to move. Use z or left click to confirm. Use x or right click to speed through dialogue. Press ESC to quit game.

This was made for the week long Loading Screen Jam and may contain bugs. Please let us know if there are any issues. We appreciate your patience, and have fun!

Music by Spencer Lee - https://soundcloud.com/itsa_me_spencer_lee

A game by Chris and Kenneth Ng - http://dissonent.com/

All assets were made by us, except for the blue cursor arrow and the font.
